name: Adventure of Kuller
description:
(Early Prototype)

This is a passion project in hopes of one day becoming a full game or kickstarting my game development career! 

Adventure of Kuller follows our protagonist Kuller, through a world of colors and shapes, play and discover what Kuller was meant to be in this 2D Top Down Turn-Based Pixel RPG

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move Up/Left/Down/Right

I - Inventory

Esc - Menu

E/Spacebar - Interact
